name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
title: Yae Miko: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
in_play_description: After your Yae Miko, who has this card equipped, destroys a Sesshou Sakura through Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin: The next use of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura this Round will cost 2 fewer Elemental Dice.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yae Miko to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yae Miko, equip this card.
After Yae Miko equips this card, immediately use Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin once.
After your Yae Miko, who has this card equipped, destroys a Sesshou Sakura through Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin: The next use of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura this Round will cost 2 fewer Elemental Dice.
(You must have Yae Miko in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
